content: Up for Auction are 2x 2013 Lealana - 0.1 BTC Brass (Buyer Funded) coinsLOT 1: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC #1103. "16T1P2gv" BUYER FUNDED LOT 2: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC #1116 "17nta5qj" BUYER FUNDEDAdditional Images**Full public addresses for BOTH lots are not known**Coins are unfundedSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 18th, 2022, 14:00:00 EST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 10 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 10 minutes will be added to that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
